review_blob: Smoother than I expected, especially with the high alcohol content. Not the big hop taste considering its a double. Low on carbonation with a small head. On tap at the pub, good valu for the money. $5 per pint.

First time. Wow! Everything they said it would be. Very bitter, peppery to the max, loved it. Hop head here, the name describes it perfectly. High alcohol and IBU but very balanced, one or two would be enough.
Was lucky enough to enjoy a few pints at our fav coffee/beer house. Awesome, look forward to it each year.

Great introduction beer to Three Floyds!
Great color, wont putoff "regular" beer drinkers. Good aroma and mouthfeel.
Medium finish.
beer_name: Three Floyds Pride & Joy Mild Ale
